text.tspan: Consumption-based COâ‚‚ emissions vs. population share, 2020
Consumption-based emissions1 are national emissions that have been adjusted for trade. This measures fossil fuel
and industry emissions2 . Land use change is not included.
Source: Our World in Data based on Global Carbon Project (GCP); United Nations - Population Division (2022)
